1.1.0 / 2014-06-16
==================

  * Escape HTML with `escape-html` module
  * Escape HTML in stack trace
  * Escape HTML in title
  * Fix up edge cases with error sent in response
  * Set `X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff` header
  * Use accepts for negotiation
